title: De Chocolade bijbel : Met meer dan 200 recepten
description: This book includes everything the chocolate lover needs to know: from chocolate's history to making mouth-watering desserts. All the techniques to make wonderful chocolate recipes are explained, with easy-to-follow, step-by-step photographs. Melting, piping, grating and decorating can be done with expertise by even the novice. With over 200 recipes, this is indeed the bible for all chocolate lovers.
author: Christine  McFadden
